Tis' the season to upgrade; and we already did! Inertia Networks is now proud to offer Xen hosting as well as OpenVZ at an affordable price! Backed by our 7 day money back guarantee, we are now offering not only OpenVZ but also Xen. Starting from just $7 a month, you can have your Xen VPS up and running in seconds with your choice of linux distro. As always you get full root access via SSH as well as console control and management from SolusVM. All VPSs are backed up on a weekly basis to an offsite secure location so you can be certain your data is always safe and secure around the clock. 

Inertia Networks, LLC is a company based in Brookfield, Wisconsin.
